channel.title: Sparta Scape Development Thread
channel.description:
[center][shadow=red,left][font=comic sans ms][size=36pt]Sparta Scape 317[/size][/font][/shadow][/center]
[center][code]12/12/11 • Fixed up the ranks. There are now 5 Donator Ranks with different colored crowns. Now playerRights 1 - 9 12/12/11 • Custom Interface to choose the color of Donator Symbol you want. Free the first time, costs 100M every other time. Interface by Nathan 12/13/11 • Added the Ornamental used with Fury and Dragon items and splitting. 1/11/12 • Added objects to home including Anger Weapons Rack 1/11/12 • Added Dialogue to the Anger Weapons Rack to purchase 1 of the 4 1/11/12 • Added Holy Water as the Currency to purchase the Anger Weapons 1/11/12 • Cleaned up the procceses 1/11/12 • Added Holy Water Drops to every Boss/ High Leveled Monster 1/13/12 • Two new interfaces are being made. Rules Interface and an interface to general information regarding the server that will appear when you click the score board. 1/14/12 • Have a friend loaning me money for website and domain. Should be up in the next week. 1/14/12 • Fixed up our modIcon loading methods. Packed in 5 different new donator symbols to match our interface. 1/14/12 • Fixed a bug that caused the client screen to freeze when dialogue loaded. 1/14/12 • Got some IDs for NPCs, ther animations for attacking, dieing and blocking. 1/14/12 • Added a few new map datas 1/15/12 • Added NPC to Teleport you to Pheonix, Giant Rocs, Slayer Cave and Lumbridge Swamp Dungeon 1/15/12 • Added NPCs to slayer 1/15/12 • Added Object to teleport you to Skeletal Horror's Lair, and object to teleport you out of the lair 1/15/12 • Added tons of NPC spawns including Slayer Cave, Lumbridge Swamp Dungeon, and skeletal horrors in their lair 1/17/12 • Added Coinbag system/orb - Credits to the releaser 1/17/12 • Ripped imsuperman05's construction (with his permission and providence) 1/17/12 • Fixed a outOfBounds error client sided due to the construction 1/18/12 • Fixed all errors regarding imsuperman05's construction base 1/18/12 • Added custom features to enhance the quality of the construction 1/20/12 • Clipped following 1/20/12 • imsuperman05 took AtomicInt's place on the team 1/20/12 • Updated Media 1/21/12 • Revamped Donator Zone. Now unique and containts many benefits. 1/21/12 • Recolored Completionist Capes 1/21/12 • Fixed all the capes where you can see through the character if you are wearing them 1/25/12 • Repackaged the whole server (Picture Below) 1/25/12 • Removed all warnings, unused bits of code, etc to improve unneeded memory usage 1/29/12 • imsuperman05 began rewriting Hunter. Not the crappy catching imps hunter, hunter where npcs run to your traps. 1/29/12 • Added proper Attack and death animations to all NPCs in Relleka Slayer Cave 1/29/12 • Added proper Attack and death animations to all NPCs in the Lumbridge Swamp Dungeons 1/29/12 • Fixed up the wall beast so it doesn't follow you but does attack you when you walk infront of it. 1/29/12 • Added attack and death animations to other Bosses and counting. 1/31/12 • Added button to switch worlds 1/31/12 • Decided to start off the Regicide Community with a PvP server and later introduce the eco server 1/31/12 • PvP Server is being cleaned now. 1/31/12 • PvP server cleaned 1/31/12 • Added new Skill tab exsclusively for PK servers 1/31/12 • Added ::item command and fixed it up to disable the spawn of certain items 1/31/12 • Cleaned Out Quest Tab 1/31/12 • Added a button to switch worlds on the client 1/31/12 • Removed all shops and NPCs on the PvP server 1/31/12 • Partially fixed up the client to work a little better and smoother\ 2/4/12 • imsuperman05 finished bank searching. Few bugs to work out on it 2/9/12 • imsuperman05 updated networking to MINA 2.0. Went from 70 players no lagg to 200 players 2/9/12 • Started on a new login system for staff accounts to reduce the hacking. The incoming IP must match one of them on a .txt list in order for a connection to establish, else not allowing a connection. 2/10/12 • imsuperman05 and asshole_rule completed bank tabs. [/code][/center]
[Center][b][size=13pt]Our Team[/size][/b] [/center] [Center]•Barrick/ Barrick[/center] [Center]Open[/center] [center]Open[/center] [center]Open[/center]
[center]I am currently looking for a Coder, and Forum Developer!
MSN - elfbow@live.com[/center]

item.title: Sparta Scape Development Thread
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

Hey B-RACK! I know you are using my updates, but instead of that being your updates you should put it as what has been done by the previous developers. Then the updates woulden’t get mixed up.

Read full topic

item.title: Sparta Scape Development Thread
item.dc:creator: @Skyru Skyru
item.description:
@Skyru wrote:

If you are looking for a development team, you might as well post a topic under the development team section.

Read full topic

item.title: Sparta Scape Development Thread
item.dc:creator: @popup popup
item.description:
@popup wrote:

i don’t know if i will help but if you post or send me some pics it will help i need to know what you have and what will be needed to do

Read full topic

item.title: Sparta Scape Development Thread
item.dc:creator: @Notepad Notepad
item.description:

Few bugs to work out on it 2/9/12 • imsuperman05 updated networking to MINA 2.0. Went from 70 players no lagg to 200 players 2/9/12 • Started on a new login system for staff accounts to reduce the hacking. The incoming IP must match one of them on a .txt list in order for a connection to establish, else not allowing a connection. 2/10/12 • imsuperman05 and asshole_rule completed bank tabs. [/center]
